name: SKCloudServiceAuthorizationStatus
desc: Constants that indicate the type of authorization the user has set for accessing the music library.

items.name: case notDetermined
items.desc: The authorization type cannot be determined.

items.name: case denied
items.desc: The user does not authorize any access to their music library.

items.name: case restricted
items.desc: Access to the music library is restricted in a way that the user cannot change, so your app should not prompt for authorization. An example of this situation is if the device is in an education mode.

items.name: case authorized
items.desc: The user authorizes playback of Apple Music tracks and the addition of tracks to their music library.
